name: Nodejs with Angularjs
body:
# NodeJS-with-AngularJS
# Registration
Step1:
Git clone https://github.com/suneel2you/NodeJS-with-AngularJS.git

Step2:
install node 

Step3:
Install npm files

Step4: 
run the main file


![signup](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-q-ZYbF9YXK0/Vt_JdOrqxUI/AAAAAAAAEGc/epoHu9rkZfI/w426-h251/localhost%2B4040.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
